parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language in which you want to display the results. Valid values: zh and en. zh indicates Chinese, which is the default value. en indicates English.

parameters.name: Config
parameters.description: The plug-in configuration. The configuration content of the WebAssembly (Wasm) plug-in is in the YAML format. The configuration content of the Lua plug-in is Lua code.

parameters.name: ConfigLevel
parameters.description:
The application scope of the plug-in. Valid values:

*   0: global
*   1: route
*   2: domain name

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description: Indicates whether the plug-in is enabled.

parameters.name: GatewayUniqueId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the gateway.

parameters.name: ResourceIdList
parameters.description: The domain IDs or route IDs. They are distinguished based on ConfigLevel.
